constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 37 (Tuesday, March 1, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GARAMENDI:
H.R. 6882.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H1207]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to include certain passenger ferries as eligible and qualified vessels under Capital Construction Funds, and for other purposes.
